wikipedia_page.main: Abigail Hutty (born 1986/1987) is a British mechanical engineer based in Stevenage. She has worked as the lead structures engineer on the European Space Agency ExoMars rover vehicle. In 2016, she was elected as the youngest ever Fellow of the Institution of Mechanical Engineers.  She advocates the science and technology education of young people and promotion of careers in the space industry.  Her public appearances have included the Royal Institution Christmas Lectures and The Sky at Night.

response: * Abbie Hutty, Lead Spacecraft Structures Engineer, ExoMars Rover, Airbus
